content: the january socks are a top down ankle sock with a classic fair isle snowflake colorwork design on the cuff the cuff is shaped with short row and the heel is a heel flap and gusset construction sizes one size women s medium measurements 4 / 10cm foot width 8 / 20cm total circumference length is adjustable suggested yarn mc 50g fingering weight yarn for main color cc 5g fingering weight yarn for contrast color sample is knit in sandes garn sisu in the colors dark blue 6062 and white 1001 suggested needles 2 5mm needles circular or dpns guage 32 stitches x 42 row = 4 x 4 / 10cm x 10cm additional materials 2 stitch markers optional techniques used german twisted cast-on 1 stranded colorwork german short row 2 picking up stitches decreasing kitchener bind-off 3 if you have any questions about this pattern please feel free to message me on ravelry dm me on instagram @allisonroseshaw 4 or email allisonrosecreates@gmail com if you share any pictures of work you make with this pattern on social media please tag me @allisonroseshaw 5 and use the hashtag #januarysocks - i d love to see what you make 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=ucwmcuiylii&t=1s 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=52qy8oob-s0 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=q-jegcued0s 4 https //www instagram com/allisonroseshaw/ 5 https //www instagram com/allisonroseshaw/
